reference.shortdesc: The no-topic-nesting element is a placeholder in the DITA architecture. It is not actually used by the default DITA document types; it is for use only when creating a validly customized document type where the information designer wants to eliminate the ability to nest topics. Not intended for use by authors, and has no associated output processing.

p.i: This element is not intended to be used in source files.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and .
